channel.title: pycon2007 on Nathan R. Yergler
channel.description: Recent content in pycon2007 on Nathan R. Yergler

item.title: Making Fun of Objects
item.description: Oh, wait; not that sort of mocking.

item.title: Testing Network Applications with NGI
item.description: Following the keynote this morning, I attended Jim Fulton’s talk on testing network applications with the Network Gateway Interface.

item.title: Testing Tools Panel @ PyCon
item.description: Matt summarizes the PyCon’s Testing Tools Panel far better than I could here .

item.title: Scaling Python on the Web
item.description: First session of the day was on Scaling Python on the Web; rough notes which I may clean up later:

item.title: Keynote: Adele Goldberg
item.description: The morning keynote for day 2 of PyCon was given by Adele Goldberg .

item.title: Web, Web Afternoon
item.description: Lunch: tasty “Mexican” food, including those tasty cinnamon-sugar coated crunchy-chewy desserty things.

item.title: PyCon Keynote: Ivan Krstic
item.description: I finally made it to the conference hotel this morning at 4AM.

item.title: Heading to PyCon
item.description: I’ve spent the first part of this week in San Francisco for some face time with the rest of the Creative Commons staff and participating in what I believe are our first all-staff meetings [1]2{#id1.

item.title: PyCon 2007 Early Bird Registration Closing Soon
item.description: So I’m registered and have my plane ticket for PyCon 2007 , taking place once again in the lovely Addison, Texas .
